name: @holoscript/component
description: HoloScript WASM Component for WASI Preview 3

scripts.build:rust: cargo build --release --target wasm32-wasip1 || echo 'Rust WASM build skipped (target not installed)'
scripts.build:component: wasm-tools component new target/wasm32-wasip1/release/holoscript_component.wasm --adapt wasi_snapshot_preview1.command.wasm -o dist/holoscript.component.wasm || echo 'WASM component generation skipped'
scripts.build:jco: jco transpile dist/holoscript.component.wasm -o dist --name holoscript || echo 'JCO transpilation skipped'
scripts.build:types: jco types dist/holoscript.component.wasm -o dist/holoscript.d.ts || echo 'Type generation skipped'
scripts.build: npm run build:rust && npm run build:component && npm run build:jco && npm run build:types
